item.description:
11:30 - 12:00 PM - Open Networking

12:00 -12:30 - Lunch Is Served

12:30 - 12:45 - Introductions

Tell us in less than 1 minute who you are, what you do, what you're promoting so we can help you build your business!

12:45 - 1:15 - Presentation

1:15 - 1:30 Networking

Website Usability 

Usability is the art of making transacting with your business intuitive and simple for your customers. When it comes to your online presence, customers don't stick around if your site is confusing, irritating, or difficult to navigate. Learn about optimizing the user experience and get practical tips on ways to make your website more user-focused.  Do's and Don’ts will be shared.

About Nancy

Nancy Wolff Leary is president of Online Amplify LLC, which helps businesses to optimize their online presence, gain visibility, and build their credibility online.  Assessing a business’ online presence from the big picture to the details, Nancy provides recommendations to improve usability, search engine optimization, social media integration, and branding.  She offers expert advice for well-organized, intuitive navigation and crafts customer-focused and keyword-rich content to help your site get found by search engines.  Once your web presence is optimized, Nancy offers social marketing support to keep your site highly visible.

group.name: Dare To Be Phenomenal's Success Minded Women's Network
